about_the_game:
A return to the D&D style of RPG games where the progression of your character will add abilities and features. Upgrade your Strength, Dexterity and Health with each level you increase. This isn't just some simple Hack and Slash game.

Currently in BETA . Free to play and undergoing intense development

Features

]
  • MASSIVELY MULTIPLAYER supporting THOUSANDS of simultaneous players
  • HUGE game world, possibly the largest you have ever played!
  • Continuous upgrades and expansions. New quests and new lands to explore
  • Custom characters. Create an avatar that is the REAL you .. Human, Elf or Orc
  • Mounts. Ride Horses or Dragons
  • Pets and Minions
  • Build your own Kingdom. Start with a humble house to store your goods. Build bigger and better until you have a Castle
  • Game time progresses at 4x real time. Day-Night cycle is 6 hours, a year in-game is 3 months of real time
  • Dynamic weather. Its sunny today, raining tomorrow
  • Tired of quests? How about some PvP combat in the Arena!

short_description: A massively multiplayer RPG in a truly massive world. Supports thousands of players in the world where is thousands of kilometers square. Create your character, join a guild or create your own and go on adventures to earn more gold and experience. Build your own home, farm or castle.
